collection_holder_name: McKissick Museum, South Carolina Broadcasters Association Archives
pageContext.collection_description: Archival papers include documents and manuscripts related to the following broadcasters and stations: Jack Cook, Wallace A. "Wally" Mullinax Sr, Charles W. "Charlie" Newcomb, Mackie Quave, G. Richard Shafto, George Dixon Stewart, James K. "Jim" Whitaker, WCRS, WESC, WIS, and WOLS
pageContext.collection_usage_statement: Contact SCBA Archives staff for reproduction policy.
